2024.title: Large Language Models (LLMs)
2024.description: LLMs like GPT-4, Claude, and Gemini revolutionized AI by understanding and generating human-like text. They are used in chatbots, content generation, and software development assistance.

2024.title: AI Image Generation Models
2024.description: Tools like DALLÂ·E, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion powered creative industries, allowing artists and developers to create realistic art, product renders, and concept visuals from text prompts.

2024.title: PyTorch
2024.description: A deep learning framework developed by Meta, known for its dynamic computation graph and flexibility. PyTorch powers research and production models in text, image, and audio generation.

2024.title: Keras
2024.description: A high-level neural networks API that simplifies model creation. Keras integrates seamlessly with TensorFlow, making it popular for prototyping and teaching generative model concepts.
